In a world where time travel has been invented, a group of bunnies discover a way to travel through time and use their newfound abilities to change the course of history. However, their actions have unintended consequences, and they must navigate the complexities of altering the timeline.

In a post-apocalyptic world, a lone bunny must navigate a desolate landscape to find a way to restore the planet to its former glory. Along the way, they encounter strange creatures and must use their wits to survive.
In a world where magic has been outlawed, a group of bunnies must use their cunning and resourcefulness to evade the authorities and practice their magical arts in secret.
In a futuristic city, a group of bunnies are trained as spies and must use their stealth and agility to infiltrate high-security facilities and gather intelligence.
In a world where bunnies have evolved to become the dominant species, they must navigate the complexities of their new society and confront the challenges of ruling over other species.
